page.title: 03WHAT I DO IN MY SPARE TIME
page.content: {Sometimes I play Cricket,Football or {ride on my bike outside.In the morning {when I wake up I play Snooker,Darts or {go on my Computer.After School I sit {down to watch Television.Then it is {time for Dinner.After Dinner I watch {more television,sometimes play Cricket {and get my pet Hamster out.On Saturday {I get up at 8.00am,get dressed and go {downstairs.I turn on the Television {and wait until the Saturday Picture {Show is on.Then I watch a film and {play on my Computer.When Gerry comes {home we sometimes go out.When I get {back home I watch Television and go to {bed at 12.45pm.On Sunday I get up at {11.00am and we go out at about 1.00pm {and come home and watch Television and {go to bed at 9.00pm. { { }By Leon Bainbridge
